channel.title: CVE Feed for Talos -- delayed_job_web rails gem
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Talos -- delayed_job_web rails gem

item.title: CVE-2017-12097|2024-08-05T18:28:16.375Z -- talos -- delayed_job_web%20rails%20gem
item.description: An exploitable cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in the filter functionality of the delayed_job_web rails gem version 1.4. A specially crafted URL can cause an XSS flaw resulting in an attacker being able to execute arbitrary javascript on the victim's browser. An attacker can phish an authenticated user to trigger this vulnerability.
